main.elyfi-content: ELYFI is a new decentralized platform that applies NFTs to connect real assets

service.title: How does it work?
service.sub-title:
Elysia creates contracts that convert real world assets into Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs),
a unique digital identifier used to represent the underlying asset.
ELYFI will utilize NFTs to connect reliable real world assets with cryptocurrency liquidity.
service.blockchain-content:
Experience a hybrid financial system on a public blockchain.
ELYFI contracts will be open source and records will be stored on distributed ledgers.
“ELYFI” is a new DEFI protocol and a project that everyone can participate in.
service.real-asset-content:
“ELYFI” links real-world assets to cryptocurrency financial systems.
Real assets are clearly valuable and secure, but they have a number of limitations.
Our platform brings real assets to cryptocurrency financial systems to help make transactions more convenient.
service.nfts-content:
ELYFI creates a variety of contracts to connect reality with virtual currency financial systems.
These contracts are unique and must be trusted.
At ELYFI, most of the contracts are created and managed as
NFTs(Non Fungible Tokens).

app.title: The Liquidity Protocol
app.title-content:
ELYFI is an open source and non-custodial liquidity protocol for earning
interest on deposits and borrowing assets.
